title: ‘Succession’ S3E2: “Mass in Time of War”
description:
Chris and Andy talk about ‘Succession’ S3E2, “Mass in Time of War.” They discuss the many versions of Kendall we have gotten so far (7:20), the play-like scene of all the siblings in a room (16:58), and the central power Logan still holds (36:29).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Producer: Kaya McMullen
